feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:12 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 09:55 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C
Wind: E 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this morning then west 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
